title: 我是op用指令方块，但是在多人游戏里说没有在此服务器里启用怎么回事？？？？
author: rrppgg

replies.author: wwpzxp
replies.txt_content:
找到server.properties用文本文档打开然后找到enable-command-block=false改成enable-command-block=true
如果没有找到enable-command-block=false 请在最下面一行添加enable-command-block=true

replies.author: x537997888
replies.txt_content: 服务端设置了命令方块关闭= =
